name: Adventures in Paradise
description: My trip is special because it brings to travelers have different feelings and overview when they come to Canada. Canada is known as one of the best living standard country in the world. The main city in Canada is Toronto where there is most of  people are working about economic. On the morning, there are a lot of people walk on the street busy for their work. At night time, when everything is light up; it is time for people join their activities and having their moment with family and friends.Canada National's Tower (CN Tower) skyline at 553.33 m ( 1.815 ft 5 in) has world-class entertainment and dining destination. When travelers stand on the highest floor, they can see all around the Toronto's city.
